title: Brielle-Elaine Tries to Fit In!
description: Brielle- Elaine is transferred to Mrs. Willowryâ€™s 4th grade class at Anaberry Elementary School in the middle of the school year. She assumes that by giving her classmates a tasty treat she will become very popular and have at least a dozen friends. After an accident happens with the treats, Brielle-Elaine is left to find a new plan to get her classmates to like her. Throughout this adventure, Brielle-Elaine tries to fit in with the different groups within her class. She discovers that pretending to be someone else is not as easy as she thought. In the end, she realizes that all she had to do was be herself. Follow Brielle-Elaine on this fun and exciting journey known as self discovery.
author: La-Toya S. Facey
